articles.author: Ramin Skibba
articles.title: Astronomers Get Ready to Probe Europa’s Hidden Ocean for Life - WIRED
articles.description: Jupiter’s most enigmatic moon, one of a few ocean worlds in the solar system, will be the target of upcoming missions by NASA and the European Space Agency.
articles.content: Beyond Mars and the asteroid belt, half a billion miles from the sun, the solar system might seem frigid, bleak, and lifeless. But scientists believe theres a chance tiny alien creatures could reside… [+3861 chars]
